item.description:
Table 1: Top canonical pathways detected enriched for DEGs in bAM cells (infected with M. bovis) and hAM cells (infected with M. tuberculosis).

Bovine alveolar macrophage P-value Human alveolar macrophage P-value
Neuroinflammation Signalling Pathway 3.66 Ã— 10-30 Neuroinflammation Signalling Pathway 7.36 Ã— 10-29
Systemic Lupus Erythematosus In B Cell Signalling Pathway 1.79 Ã— 10-28 TH1 and TH2 Activation Pathway 2.70 Ã— 10-28
Role of Macrophages, Fibroblasts and Endothelial Cells In Rheumatoid Arthritis 7.01 Ã— 10-27 Granulocyte Adhesion and Diapedesis 7.37 Ã— 10-28
Hepatic Fibrosis Signalling Pathway 5.98 Ã— 10-25 Glucocorticoid Receptor Signalling 3.26 Ã— 10-24
Type I Diabetes Mellitus Signalling 6.11 Ã— 10-25 Agranulocyte Adhesion and Diapedesis 4.01 Ã— 10-24

References:

  1. Hall TJ, Mullen MP, McHugo GP, Killick KE, Ring SC, Berry DP, et al. Integrative genomics of the mammalian alveolar macrophage response to intracellular mycobacteria. bioRxiv. 2020.
  2. KrÃ¤mer A, Green J, Pollard Jr J, Tugendreich S. Causal analysis approaches in Ingenuity Pathway Analysis. Bioinformatics. 2014; 30(4):523-30.
